sentences.en: At a certain age, it's not viable for men to take a backward step into unskilled work.
sentences.cn: 到了一定的年龄，就不可能再退回去干不需要技能的工作。

sentences.en: Automation has obsoleted many unskilled workers.
sentences.cn: 自动化使很多非技术工人受到淘汰.

sentences.en: Average earnings for unskilled workers are decreasing now.
sentences.cn: 非熟练工人的平均工资现今正在降低.

sentences.en: By 1886 the organization had about 700,000 members, both skilled craftsmen and unskilled factory workers.
sentences.cn: 1886年它的会员数增加到约700,000人, 包括熟练和非熟练工人.

sentences.en: Demand for skilled workers is high ; but there is no demand for unskilled ones.
sentences.cn: 非常需要熟练工人, 但却不需要生手.

sentences.en: Female unskilled workers are concentrated in this activity.
sentences.cn: 非熟练女工集中从事这种工作.

sentences.en: Many unskilled workers are certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 许多技术不熟练的工人肯定会失业的.

sentences.en: Most of those who left the province to work abroad were unskilled.
sentences.cn: 那些离开该省出国打工的人大部分都未经专门训练。

sentences.en: The industry continues to use less unskilled and semi - skilled labor.
sentences.cn: 建筑部门不断减少对非熟练工人和半熟练工人的使用.

sentences.en: The unskilled section of the working class was diminishing as a proportion of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 劳动力中非熟练工人的人数正在减少.

sentences.en: Unemployment has hit unskilled workers in particular.
sentences.cn: 失业尤其冲击到了无特别技能的工人.

sentences.en: Unskilled workers usually earn less money than skilled workers.
sentences.cn: 无技能的工人通常比有技能的工人挣钱少.

sentences.en: WARNING: UNSKILLED USE IS NOT RECOMMENDED . PROFESSIONAL USE ONLY.
sentences.cn: 警告: 不建议业馀者使用,只适合于专业人任使用.

sentences.en: With no education, you will get only unskilled work.
sentences.cn: 未受过教育, 你只能做无需技能的简单工作.

words.tran_cn: 不熟练的；不灵巧的，笨拙的；无技巧的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 非技术性工种；做粗活的工人；不熟练工人

trans.tran_cn: 不熟练的，不需要特殊技能的，不擅长的，拙劣的
trans.tran_en: an unskilled worker has not been trained for a particular type of job

trans.tran_cn: 不熟练，无技能(unskill的过去式和过去分词形式)
